description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、经济管理家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国第一代和第二代中央领导集体的重要成员，被认为是中共八大元老之一。
description.en: A Chinese politician and economic manager, an important member of the first and second generation of the central leadership collective of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and considered one of the Eight Elders of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 陈云的夫人，曾在五七干校因张贴大字报揭发江青而被开除党籍和隔离审查。
description.en: Wife of Chen Yun. She was expelled from the party and placed in isolation for investigation after posting a big-character poster exposing Jiang Qing at a May Seventh Cadre School.

description.zh-cn: 陈云长子，曾任国家开发银行董事长、全国政协副主席。
description.en: Eldest son of Chen Yun, former Chairman of the China Development Bank and Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会
en: Central Advisory Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 1982年至1992年间设立的中共中央组织，旨在为党中央提供政治辅助和咨询。
description.en: An organization of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China established from 1982 to 1992, aimed at providing political assistance and consultation to the Party Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物，改革开放的主要设计师。
description.en: Chinese politician, the paramount leader of the second generation of the Communist Party of China's central leadership collective, and the chief architect of the Reform and Opening-Up.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会
en: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary inspection body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央纪委书记、全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary, politician, and theorist, the main founder and first paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央主席、国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the CCP and Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央主席和中共中央总书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the CCP and General Secretary of the Central Committee of the CCP.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家、外交家，中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, military leader, and diplomat who served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

en: Eight Elders of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 指在1980年代至1990年代间在中华人民共和国拥有实际决策权的一批中国共产党元老。
description.en: A group of senior members of the Communist Party of China who held actual decision-making power in the People's Republic of China during the 1980s and 1990s.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动，对中国社会造成了深远的影响。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong, which had a profound impact on Chinese society.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家著名出版机构，陈云早年曾在此当学徒。
description.en: A famous publishing institution in China where Chen Yun was an apprentice in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 中共早期领导人之一，中共中央特科负责人，后被捕叛变。
description.en: An early leader of the CCP and head of the Central Special Branch, who was later arrested and defected.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央总书记，后被捕叛变。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the CCP, who was later arrested and defected.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级领导人，在延安整风运动和文化大革命期间负责情报和安全工作，迫害了大量干部。
description.en: A senior leader of the Communist Party of China, responsible for intelligence and security work during the Yan'an Rectification Movement and the Cultural Revolution, and persecuted a large number of cadres.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第四任妻子，“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: Mao Zedong's fourth wife and a member of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国早期主要领导人之一，后因“高岗饶漱石事件”而自杀。
description.en: One of the main leaders in the early days of the People's Republic of China, who later committed suicide due to the 'Gao Gang-Rao Shushi Affair'.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发起的旨在快速实现工业化和农业集体化的经济和社会运动，最终导致了严重的经济危机和饥荒。
description.en: An economic and social campaign launched by Mao Zedong aimed at rapid industrialization and agricultural collectivization, which ultimately led to a severe economic crisis and famine.

description.zh-cn: 指文化大革命后期形成的，由江青、张春桥、姚文元、王洪文组成的中共党内政治集团。
description.en: Refers to a political faction within the Communist Party of China formed in the later stages of the Cultural Revolution, consisting of Jiang Qing, Zhang Chunqiao, Yao Wenyuan, and Wang Hongwen.

description.zh-cn: 陈云提出的经济理论，主张市场经济应在国家计划的指导下进行，即“鸟应关在笼子里”。
description.en: An economic theory proposed by Chen Yun, advocating that the market economy should operate under the guidance of state planning, i.e., 'the bird should be kept in the cage'.

description.zh-cn: 指1989年6月3日晚至4日凌晨，中国人民解放军在北京天安门广场对示威学生进行的武力清场行动。
description.en: Refers to the military operation by the People's Liberation Army to clear demonstrating students from Tiananmen Square in Beijing on the night of June 3rd to the early morning of June 4th, 1989.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席，在文化大革命中被迫害致死。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as President of the PRC and was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 陈云与于若木于1938年3月结婚。
description.en: Chen Yun and Yu Ruomu married in March 1938.

description.zh-cn: 陈元是陈云的长子。
description.en: Chen Yuan is the eldest son of Chen Yun.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈云接替邓小平担任中央顾问委员会主任。
description.en: Chen Yun succeeded Deng Xiaoping as Chairman of the Central Advisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 接替邓小平担任中国共产党中央顾问委员会主任。
description.en: Succeeded Deng Xiaoping as Chairman of the Central Advisory Commission of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 1978年12月在中共十一届三中全会上当选为中央纪委第一书记。
description.en: Elected as the First Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection at the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CCP in December 1978.

description.zh-cn: 乔石接替陈云担任中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会书记。
description.en: Qiao Shi succeeded Chen Yun as the Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈云曾两度担任中共中央委员会副主席。
description.en: Chen Yun served twice as Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东担任中共中央主席期间，陈云任副主席。
description.en: During Mao Zedong's tenure as Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Chen Yun served as Vice Chairman.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在华国锋担任中共中央主席期间，陈云任副主席。
description.en: During Hua Guofeng's tenure as Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Chen Yun served as Vice Chairman.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在胡耀邦担任中共中央主席期间，陈云任副主席。
description.en: During Hu Yaobang's tenure as Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Chen Yun served as Vice Chairman.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 陈云担任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chen Yun served as Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在周恩来担任国务院总理期间，陈云任副总理。
description.en: During Zhou Enlai's tenure as Premier of the State Council, Chen Yun served as Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 陈云被认为是中共八大元老之一，在1980年代至1990年代间拥有实际决策权。
description.en: Chen Yun is considered one of the Eight Elders of the CCP, holding actual decision-making power from the 1980s to the 1990s.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，陈云受到迫害，家被红卫兵抄家，并被下放到江西的工厂劳动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Chen Yun was persecuted, his home was raided by Red Guards, and he was sent down to work in a factory in Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 陈云因提出“反冒进”而受到毛泽东批评，并在大跃进期间被迫做检讨。
description.en: Chen Yun was criticized by Mao Zedong for proposing 'anti-rash advance' and was forced to make self-criticisms during the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 在中共中央特科负责人顾顺章被捕叛变后，陈云协助周恩来处理后续危机。
description.en: After Gu Shunzhang, the head of the CCP's Central Special Branch, was arrested and defected, Chen Yun assisted Zhou Enlai in handling the ensuing crisis.

description.zh-cn: 陈云执意反对康生在“湖西事件”和“拯救运动”中的迫害干部行为，康生则在文革期间攻击陈云。
description.en: Chen Yun adamantly opposed Kang Sheng's persecution of cadres during the 'Huxi Incident' and the 'Rescue Movement', while Kang Sheng attacked Chen Yun during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 陈云反对江青转入鲁迅艺术学校，并在毛泽东与江青结婚的问题上表达了反对意见。文革后，他主张审判四人帮，但反对判处江青死刑。
description.en: Chen Yun opposed Jiang Qing's transfer to the Lu Xun Academy of Arts and expressed his opposition to Mao Zedong's marriage to Jiang Qing. After the Cultural Revolution, he advocated for the trial of the Gang of Four but opposed giving Jiang Qing the death penalty.

description.zh-cn: 高岗试图联合陈云和邓小平排挤刘少奇和周恩来，但遭到陈云的反对。陈云在反对高岗、饶漱石的斗争中发挥了作用。
description.en: Gao Gang attempted to ally with Chen Yun and Deng Xiaoping to sideline Liu Shaoqi and Zhou Enlai, but was opposed by Chen Yun. Chen Yun played a role in the struggle against Gao Gang and Rao Shushi.

description.zh-cn: 与叶剑英商议对策，最终暗示采取非常手段，促成了对“四人帮”的粉碎。
description.en: Consulted with Ye Jianying on countermeasures, ultimately suggesting extraordinary measures, which contributed to the smashing of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 在中共中央政治局扩大会议上对胡耀邦进行了批评，同意他辞去中共中央总书记的职务。
description.en: At an enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee, he criticized Hu Yaobang and agreed to his resignation from the post of General Secretary of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 陈云提出“鸟笼经济”理论，强调经济发展必须在计划指导下进行。
description.en: Chen Yun proposed the 'Bird-cage economy' theory, emphasizing that economic development must be conducted under the guidance of a plan.

description.zh-cn: 主持中共中央顾问委员会常委会议，主张采取以军事手段镇压学生运动。
description.en: Chaired a meeting of the Standing Committee of the Central Advisory Commission, advocating for the use of military means to suppress the student movement.

description.zh-cn: 在“高岗饶漱石事件”中，陈云与邓小平站在了刘少奇一边。文革后，他领导中纪委复查并最终平反了刘少奇案。
description.en: During the 'Gao Gang-Rao Shushi Affair', Chen Yun and Deng Xiaoping sided with Liu Shaoqi. After the Cultural Revolution, he led the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection to review and eventually rehabilitate Liu Shaoqi's case.
